exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a, b : R v : V Unable to unify "forall P : ?V -> Prop, locally (scal (?M2370 - ?M2369) ?M2371) P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (?M2370 - ?M2369)) (Riemann_sum (fun _ : R => ?M2371) ptd)) (KH_fine ?M2369 ?M2370) P" with "iota (is_KHInt (fun _ : R => v) a b) = ModuleSpace.scal R_Ring (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class R_Ring V) V) (ModuleSpace.class R_Ring V) (b - a) v".

original: intros a b v. unfold KHInt. unfold scal. apply is_KHInt_const.
